sorcer.core.context
Class ContextManagementAdapter

java.lang.Object
  sorcer.core.context.ContextManagementAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextManagement
public class ContextManagementAdapter
extends Object
implements ContextManagement

Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network. The ContextManagement interface is implemented by providers to allow for remote calls to obtain, update and delete contexts.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface sorcer.core.context.ContextManagement
CONTEXT_FILENAME, CONTEXT_REQUEST_PATH

          Gets the list of methods of the defined interface which have contexts defined on in the dataContext storage
 boolean deleteContext(String interfaceName, String methodName)
          Deletes a dataContext from the data store, the data store is then updated so that future requests are handled properly.
 Context getContext()
          Returns the default dataContext by the defining provider.
 String getContextScript()
          Returns the default dataContext script by the defining provider.

          Obtains the dataContext from data storage used to hold the contexts.

          Returns the dataContext script or its URL.
 boolean saveMethodContext(String interfaceName, String methodName, Context theContext)
          Saves the dataContext to the local data store and updates the file used for permanent storage

getMethodContext

public Context getMethodContext(String interfaceName,
                                String methodName)
                         throws RemoteException
Description copied from interface: ContextManagement
Obtains the dataContext from data storage used to hold the contexts. Returns an empty dataContext in the event the requested one is not found.

Specified by:
getMethodContext in interface ContextManagement
Parameters:
interfaceName - String of the interface name the method is defined on
methodName - Name of the method the dataContext is saved as
Returns:
Context representing the methodName
Throws:
RemoteException
